Posts.Content: Jun 28, 2010 02:48PM Karenmimom wrote: Madalyn and Allison, thank you, so much for the info on how to contact each other off the board. I finally figured it out the other day, and was able to reach Milissa. It's wonderful to know that people here step up and help! Karen  :)
Posts.Title: give away milissalynn Karenmimom

Posts.Content: Jun 25, 2010 02:31PM Karenmimom wrote: Hello, Milissalynn.  I'm so sorry to hear of the passing of your Mother.  I keep all cancer patients in my prayers daily, and after reading of your loss, I said a special prayer for your Mom. I just found this website and joined today in hopes to find answers to many of my questions, and was surprised to see your offer of the bras and prosthetics.  I happen to be the same size as your Mother, and would deeply appreciate them if they are still available.  I hope you see this post because I don't know how to email people individually as yet. God bless you for this offer. Take care, Karen
Posts.Title: give away milissalynn Karenmimom
